definition: (located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
just at (that time)/right in (that place)/right in the middle of (doing sth)
to be in/to lie in/to consist in/to depend on/to rest with
place/location/(after a noun) place where it is located
not to be present/to be out/(euphemism) to pass away/to be deceased
to be present/to be on the scene
to be situated at/to find oneself at
to have as its purpose/to be intended to/to aim to (do sth)

sentences.english: He had formerly been in business at Bristol, but failed in debt to a number of people, compounded, and went to America.
sentences.chinese: 在那里他专心一志地做生意，在几年中就赚到许多钱。

sentences.english: He had formerly been in business at Bristol, but failed in debt to a number of people, compounded, and went to America.
sentences.chinese: 在那里他专心一志地做生意，在几年中就赚到许多钱。

sentences.english: Once more, Cinderella's fairy godmother reminded her to be home by midnight.
sentences.chinese: 仙女教母再一次提醒辛德瑞拉要在午夜前到家。

sentences.english: Yeah, like gentle breeze blowing through the cheeks, the hair dancing in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 是的，像微风吹过面颊，因为发梢在跳舞。

sentences.english: The 7th China-EU Leaders' Meeting will take place on the following day there.
sentences.chinese: 第七次中欧领导人会晤将于8日在这里举行。

sentences.english: Even in time of danger, many times in body armor.
sentences.chinese: 甚至在危险时刻，多次以身相护。

sentences.english: When you share a page, you can designate users as viewers or editors.
sentences.chinese: 在共享页面时，您可以将用户指定为查看者或编辑者。

sentences.english: I'm sorry, I'm not in a position to help you financially.
sentences.chinese: 我很抱歉，我没办法在财务上帮你忙。

sentences.english: Other violence occurred at Friendship Road and at Liberation Road, they said.
sentences.chinese: 他们说还有其它的暴力事件发生在友谊路和解放大道。

sentences.english: How many offerings are listed in these first seven chapters?
sentences.chinese: 在利未记的头七章总共列出了多少种献祭？

sentences.english: To me, in the love of the river, I often feel like I was upstream .
sentences.chinese: 于我，在爱情的河流里，我经常觉得自己在逆流而上。

sentences.english: To me, in the love of the river, I often feel like I was upstream .
sentences.chinese: 于我，在爱情的河流里，我经常觉得自己在逆流而上。

sentences.english: Many disaster will happen every day in the world.
sentences.chinese: 在这个世界上，天天都邑发生很多灾难性的工作。

sentences.english: The Oedipus business comes nearer to home.
sentences.chinese: 伊迪帕斯在朝家的方向走。

sentences.english: So what happens in the very likely event they find more tainted products?
sentences.chinese: 那么，如果在整治中发现了更加有害的产品呢？

sentences.english: Coriolis acceleration is a nodus in general mechanics.
sentences.chinese: 科里奥利加速度在普通物理力学中是一难点。

definition: of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
